languages.text: "Не желаю больше видеть это корыто. Отдайте "Бессердечного" реколлигерам, пусть разберут на металлолом".
"I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."
languages.original_text: "Не желаю больше видеть это корыто. Отдайте "Бессердечного" реколлигерам, пусть разберут на металлолом".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot stand the sight of that so-called ship. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."
"I cannot stand the sight of that so-called ship. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."
"I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."
"I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."
"I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."
"I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."

languages.text: «Quiero esa bañera desproporcionada fuera de mi vista. Envíe la Desalmada a los Recolectores para que la despiecen».
languages.original_text: "I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero esa bañera desproporcionada fuera de mi vista. Envíe la Desalmada a los Recolectores para que la despiecen».

languages.text: “我再也不想看到这个破破烂烂的铁桶了。把无心号交给回收专员，让他们把它拆了吧。”
languages.original_text: "I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."

traits.locale_text: “我再也不想看到这个破破烂烂的铁桶了。把无心号交给回收专员，让他们把它拆了吧。”

languages.text: « Je ne veux plus jamais revoir ce sale rafiot monstrueux. Livrez le Sans-Cœur aux récupérateurs pour démantèlement. »
languages.original_text: "I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne veux plus jamais revoir ce sale rafiot monstrueux. Livrez le Sans-Cœur aux récupérateurs pour démantèlement. »

languages.text: 「その大きなバスタブのようなものを{mf|俺|私}の視界から消してくれ。ハートレスを回収業者に引き渡し、スクラップに変えろ」
languages.original_text: "I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."

traits.locale_text: 「その大きなバスタブのようなものを{mf|俺|私}の視界から消してくれ。ハートレスを回収業者に引き渡し、スクラップに変えろ」

languages.text: "Şu koca tekneyi gözüm görmesin. Taşkalp'i geri dönüşümcülere verin, hurdaya dönüştürsünler."
languages.original_text: "I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."

traits.locale_text: "Şu koca tekneyi gözüm görmesin. Taşkalp'i geri dönüşümcülere verin, hurdaya dönüştürsünler."

languages.text: "Schafft mir diese zu groß geratene Badewanne aus den Augen. Übergebt die Heartless den Recolligern, um sie verschrotten zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "I want that oversized tub out of my sight. Give the Heartless over to the recolligers to be turned into scrap."

traits.locale_text: "Schafft mir diese zu groß geratene Badewanne aus den Augen. Übergebt die Heartless den Recolligern, um sie verschrotten zu lassen."
